   20: 
   21: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File    : erl_print_SUITE.erl
   23: %%% Author  : Rickard Green <rickard.s.green@ericsson.com>
   24: %%% Description : 
   25: %%%
   26: %%% Created : 10 Mar 2005 by Rickard Green <rickard.s.green@ericsson.com>
   27: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: -module(erl_print_SUITE).
   29: -author('rickard.s.green@ericsson.com').
   30: 
   31: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   32: 
   33: -export([erlang_display/1, integer/1, float/1,
   34:          string/1, character/1, snprintf/1, quote/1]).
   35: 
   36: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   37: 
   38: suite() ->
   39:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   40:      {timetrap, {minutes, 10}}].
   41: 
   42: all() -> 
   43:     [erlang_display, integer, float, string, character,
   44:      snprintf, quote].
   45: 
   46: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   47:     [{testcase, Case}|Config].
   48: 
   49: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: %%
   53: %%
   54: %% Test cases
   55: %%
   56: %%
   57: 
   58: erlang_display(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   59:     put(erlang_display_test, ok),
   60:     OAIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
   61: 
   62:     %% atoms
   63:     chk_display(atom, "atom"),
   64:     chk_display(true, "true"),
   65:     chk_display(false, "false"),
   66:     chk_display('DOWN', "'DOWN'"),
   67:     chk_display('EXIT', "'EXIT'"),
   68:     chk_display('asdDofw $@{}][', "'asdDofw $@{}]['"),
   69: 
   70:     %% integers
   71:     chk_display(0, "0"),
   72:     chk_display(1, "1"),
   73:     chk_display(4711, "4711"),
   74:     chk_display(((1 bsl 27) - 1), "134217727"),
   75:     chk_display((1 bsl 27), "134217728"),
   76:     chk_display((1 bsl 32), "4294967296"),
   77:     chk_display(11111111111, "11111111111"),
   78:     chk_display((1 bsl 59) - 1, "576460752303423487"),
   79:     chk_display(1 bsl 59, "576460752303423488"),
   80:     chk_display(111111111111111111111, "111111111111111111111"),
   81:     chk_display(123456789012345678901234567890,
   82:                 "123456789012345678901234567890"),
   83:     chk_display(1 bsl 10000, str_1_bsl_10000()),
   84:     chk_display(-1, "-1"),
   85:     chk_display(-4711, "-4711"),
   86:     chk_display(-(1 bsl 27), "-134217728"),
   87:     chk_display(-((1 bsl 27) + 1), "-134217729"),
   88:     chk_display(-(1 bsl 32), "-4294967296"),
   89:     chk_display(-11111111111, "-11111111111"),
   90:     chk_display(-(1 bsl 59), "-576460752303423488"),
   91:     chk_display(-((1 bsl 59) + 1), "-576460752303423489"),
   92:     chk_display(-111111111111111111111, "-111111111111111111111"),
   93:     chk_display(-123456789012345678901234567890,
   94:                 "-123456789012345678901234567890"),
   95:     chk_display(-(1 bsl 10000), [$- | str_1_bsl_10000()]),
   96: 
   97:     MyCre = my_cre(),
   98: 
   99:     {Ser1, Ser2, LPort} = case erlang:system_info(wordsize) of
  100:                               4 -> {0, 0, 1 bsl 27};
  101:                               8 -> {42, 1 bsl 30, 1 bsl 40}
  102:                    end,
  103: 
  104:     %% pids
  105:     chk_display(mk_pid_xstr({node(), MyCre}, 4711, Ser1)),
  106:     chk_display(mk_pid_xstr({node(), MyCre}, 1 bsl 27, Ser2)),
  107:     chk_display(mk_pid_xstr({node(), oth_cre(MyCre)}, 4711, 42)),
  108:     chk_display(mk_pid_xstr({node(), oth_cre(MyCre)}, 1 bsl 27, Ser2)),
  109:     chk_display(mk_pid_xstr({node(), oth_cre(oth_cre(MyCre))}, 4711, 42)),
  110:     chk_display(mk_pid_xstr({node(), oth_cre(oth_cre(MyCre))}, 1 bsl 27, Ser2)),
  111: 
  112:     chk_display(mk_pid_xstr({a@b, MyCre}, 4711, 42)),
  113:     chk_display(mk_pid_xstr({a@b, oth_cre(MyCre)}, 4711, 42)),
  114:     chk_display(mk_pid_xstr({a@b, oth_cre(oth_cre(MyCre))}, 4711, 42)),
  115: 
  116:     %% ports
  117:     chk_display(mk_port_xstr({node(), MyCre}, 4711)),
  118:     chk_display(mk_port_xstr({node(), MyCre}, LPort)),
  119:     chk_display(mk_port_xstr({node(), oth_cre(MyCre)}, 4711)),
  120:     chk_display(mk_port_xstr({node(), oth_cre(MyCre)}, LPort)),
  121:     chk_display(mk_port_xstr({node(), oth_cre(oth_cre(MyCre))}, 4711)),
  122:     chk_display(mk_port_xstr({node(), oth_cre(oth_cre(MyCre))}, LPort)),
  123: 
  124:     chk_display(mk_port_xstr({c@d, MyCre}, 4711)),
  125:     chk_display(mk_port_xstr({c@d, MyCre}, LPort)),
  126:     chk_display(mk_port_xstr({c@d, oth_cre(MyCre)}, 4711)),
  127:     chk_display(mk_port_xstr({c@d, oth_cre(MyCre)}, LPort)),
  128:     chk_display(mk_port_xstr({c@d, oth_cre(oth_cre(MyCre))}, 4711)),
  129:     chk_display(mk_port_xstr({c@d, oth_cre(oth_cre(MyCre))}, LPort)),
  130: 
  131:     %% refs
  132:     chk_display(mk_ref_xstr({node(), MyCre}, [1,2,3])),
  133:     chk_display(mk_ref_xstr({node(), oth_cre(MyCre)}, [1,2,3])),
  134:     chk_display(mk_ref_xstr({node(), oth_cre(oth_cre(MyCre))}, [1,2,3])),
  135: 
  136:     chk_display(mk_ref_xstr({e@f, MyCre},[1,2,3] )),
  137:     chk_display(mk_ref_xstr({e@f, oth_cre(MyCre)}, [1,2,3])),
  138:     chk_display(mk_ref_xstr({e@f, oth_cre(oth_cre(MyCre))}, [1,2,3])),
  139: 
  140:     %% Compound terms
  141:     {Pid, PidStr} = mk_pid_xstr({x@y, oth_cre(MyCre)}, 4712, 41),
  142:     {Port, PortStr} = mk_port_xstr({x@y, oth_cre(MyCre)}, 4712),
  143:     {Ref, RefStr} = mk_ref_xstr({e@f, oth_cre(MyCre)}, [11,12,13]),
  144: 
  145:     chk_display({atom,-4711,Ref,{"hej",[Pid,222222222222222222222222,Port,4711]}},
  146:                 "{atom,-4711,"++RefStr++",{\"hej\",["++PidStr++",222222222222222222222222,"++PortStr++",4711]}}"),
  147:     chk_display({{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{hi}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}},
  148:                 "{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{hi}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}"),
  149:     chk_display([[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[yo]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]],
  150:                 "[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[yo]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]"),
  151:     chk_display({[{[{[{[{[{[{[{[{[{[{[{[ii]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]},
  152:                 "{[{[{[{[{[{[{[{[{[{[{[{[ii]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}"),
  153:     chk_display([], "[]"), % Not really a compound term :)
  154:     chk_display([a|b], "[a|b]"),
  155:     chk_display([a,b,c|z], "[a,b,c|z]"),
  156:     chk_display([a,b,c], "[a,b,c]"),
  157:     chk_display([Pid,Port,Ref],
  158:                 "["++PidStr++","++PortStr++","++RefStr++"]"),
  159:     chk_display("abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz",
  160:                 "\"abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz\""),
  161:     chk_display("ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ",
  162:                 "\"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ\""),
  163:     chk_display("H E J", "\"H E J\""),
  164:     chk_display("asdDofw $@{}][", "\"asdDofw $@{}][\""),
  165: 
  166:     %%
  167:     %% TODO: Check binaries, fun and floats...
  168:     %%
  169: 
  170:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, OAIS),
  171:     ok = get(erlang_display_test).
  172: 
  173: get_chnl_no(NodeName) when is_atom(NodeName) ->
  174:     erts_debug:get_internal_state({channel_number, NodeName}).
  175: 
  176: chk_display(Term, Expect) when is_list(Expect) ->
  177:     Dstr = erts_internal:term_to_string(Term),
  178:     case Expect of
  179:         Dstr ->
  180:             io:format("Test of \"~p\" succeeded.~n"
  181:                       "  Expected and got: ~s~n",
  182:                       [Term, io_lib:write_string(Dstr)]);
  183:         DoExpect ->
  184:             io:format("***~n"
  185:                       "*** Test of \"~p\" failed!~n"
  186:                       "***       Expected: ~s~n"
  187:                       "***            Got: ~s~n"
  188:                       "***~n",
  189:                       [Term,
  190:                        io_lib:write_string(DoExpect),
  191:                        io_lib:write_string(Dstr)]),
  192:             put(erlang_display_test, failed)
  193:     end.
  194: 
  195: chk_display({Term, Expect}) ->
  196:     chk_display(Term, Expect).
  197: 
  198: mk_pid_xstr({NodeName, Creation}, Number, Serial) ->
  199:     Pid = mk_pid({NodeName, Creation}, Number, Serial),
  200:     XStr = "<" ++ integer_to_list(get_chnl_no(NodeName))
  201:     ++ "." ++ integer_to_list(Number)
  202:     ++ "." ++ integer_to_list(Serial) ++ ">",
  203:     {Pid, XStr}.
  204: 
  205: mk_port_xstr({NodeName, Creation}, Number) ->
  206:     Port = mk_port({NodeName, Creation}, Number),
  207:     XStr = "#Port<" ++ integer_to_list(get_chnl_no(NodeName))
  208:     ++ "." ++ integer_to_list(Number) ++ ">",
  209:     {Port, XStr}.
  210: 
  211: mk_ref_xstr({NodeName, Creation}, Numbers) ->
  212:     Ref = mk_ref({NodeName, Creation}, Numbers),
  213:     XStr = "#Ref<" ++ integer_to_list(get_chnl_no(NodeName))
  214:     ++ ref_numbers_xstr(Numbers) ++ ">",
  215:     {Ref, XStr}.
  216: 
  217: ref_numbers_xstr([]) ->
  218:     [];
  219: ref_numbers_xstr([N | Ns]) ->
  220:     ref_numbers_xstr(Ns) ++ "." ++ integer_to_list(N).
  221: 
  222: -define(TESTCASE_IMPL(T), T(A) -> default_testcase_impl(A)).
  223: 
  224: ?TESTCASE_IMPL(integer).
  225: ?TESTCASE_IMPL(float).
  226: ?TESTCASE_IMPL(string).
  227: ?TESTCASE_IMPL(character).
  228: ?TESTCASE_IMPL(snprintf).
  229: ?TESTCASE_IMPL(quote).
  230: 
  231: %%
  232: %%
  233: %% Auxiliary functions
  234: %%
  235: %%
  236: 
  237: default_testcase_impl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> run_case(Config).
  238: 
  239: -define(TESTPROG, "erl_print_tests").
  240: -define(FAILED_MARKER, $E,$P,$-,$T,$E,$S,$T,$-,$F,$A,$I,$L,$U,$R,$E).
  241: -define(SKIPPED_MARKER, $E,$P,$-,$T,$E,$S,$T,$-,$S,$K,$I,$P).
  242: -define(SUCCESS_MARKER, $E,$P,$-,$T,$E,$S,$T,$-,$S,$U,$C,$C,$E,$S,$S).
  243: -define(PID_MARKER, $E,$P,$-,$T,$E,$S,$T,$-,$P,$I,$D).
  244: 
  245: port_prog_killer(EProc, OSProc) when is_pid(EProc), is_list(OSProc) ->
  246:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  247:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, EProc),
  248:     receive
  249:         {'DOWN', Ref, _, _, Reason} when is_tuple(Reason),
  250:                                          element(1, Reason)
  251:                                          == timetrap_timeout ->
  252:             Cmd = "kill -9 " ++ OSProc,
  253:             io:format("Test case timed out. "
  254:                       "Trying to kill port program.~n"
  255:                       "  Executing: ~p~n", [Cmd]),
  256:             case os:cmd(Cmd) of
  257:                 [] ->
  258:                     ok;
  259:                 OsCmdRes ->
  260:                     io:format("             ~s", [OsCmdRes])
  261:             end;
  262:         {'DOWN', Ref, _, _, _} ->
  263:             %% OSProc is assumed to have terminated by itself
  264:             ok
  265:     end.
  266: 
  267: get_line(_Port, eol, Data) ->
  268:     Data;
  269: get_line(Port, noeol, Data) ->
  270:     receive
  271:         {Port, {data, {Flag, NextData}}} ->
  272:             get_line(Port, Flag, Data ++ NextData);
  273:         {Port, eof} ->
  274:             ct:fail(port_prog_unexpectedly_closed)
  275:     end.
  276: 
  277: read_case_data(Port, TestCase) ->
  278:     receive
  279:         {Port, {data, {eol, [?SUCCESS_MARKER]}}} ->
  280:             ok;
  281:         {Port, {data, {Flag, [?SUCCESS_MARKER | CommentStart]}}} ->
  282:             {comment, get_line(Port, Flag, CommentStart)};
  283:         {Port, {data, {Flag, [?SKIPPED_MARKER | CommentStart]}}} ->
  284:             {skipped, get_line(Port, Flag, CommentStart)};
  285:         {Port, {data, {Flag, [?FAILED_MARKER | ReasonStart]}}} ->
  286:             ct:fail(get_line(Port, Flag, ReasonStart));
  287:         {Port, {data, {eol, [?PID_MARKER | PidStr]}}} ->
  288:             io:format("Port program pid: ~s~n", [PidStr]),
  289:             CaseProc = self(),
  290:             _ = list_to_integer(PidStr), % Sanity check
  291:             spawn_opt(fun () ->
  292:                               port_prog_killer(CaseProc, PidStr)
  293:                       end,
  294:                       [{priority, max}, link]),
  295:             read_case_data(Port, TestCase);
  296:         {Port, {data, {Flag, LineStart}}} ->
  297:             io:format("~s~n", [get_line(Port, Flag, LineStart)]),
  298:             read_case_data(Port, TestCase);
  299:         {Port, eof} ->
  300:             ct:fail(port_prog_unexpectedly_closed)
  301:     end.
  302: 
  303: run_case(Config) ->
  304:     run_case(Config, "").
  305: 
  306: run_case(Config, TestArgs) ->
  307:     run_case(Config, TestArgs, fun (_Port) -> ok end).
  308: 
  309: run_case(Config, TestArgs, Fun) ->
  310:     Test = atom_to_list(proplists:get_value(testcase, Config)),
  311:     TestProg = filename:join([proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  312:                               ?TESTPROG
  313:                               ++ "."
  314:                               ++ atom_to_list(erlang:system_info(threads))]),
  315:     Cmd = TestProg ++ " " ++ Test ++ " " ++ TestArgs,
  316:     case catch open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream,
  317:                                         use_stdio,
  318:                                         stderr_to_stdout,
  319:                                         eof,
  320:                                         {line, 1024}]) of
  321:         Port when is_port(Port) ->
  322:             Fun(Port),
  323:             CaseResult = read_case_data(Port, Test),
  324:             receive
  325:                 {Port, eof} ->
  326:                     ok
  327:             end,
  328:             CaseResult;
  329:         Error ->
  330:             ct:fail({open_port_failed, Error})
  331:     end.
  332: 
  333: mk_pid(Node, Number, Serial) ->
  334:     erts_test_utils:mk_ext_pid(Node, Number, Serial).
  335: 
  336: mk_port(Node, Number) ->
  337:     erts_test_utils:mk_ext_port(Node, Number).
  338: 
  339: mk_ref(Node, Numbers) ->
  340:     erts_test_utils:mk_ext_ref(Node, Numbers).
  341: 
  342: my_cre() -> erlang:system_info(creation).
  343: 
  344: oth_cre(N) when N >= 0, N < (1 bsl 32) ->
  345:     (N rem ((1 bsl 32) - 1)) + 1;
  346: oth_cre(N) ->
  347:     exit({invalid_creation, N}).
  348: 
  349: str_1_bsl_10000() ->
  350:     "19950631168807583848837421626835850838234968318861924548520089498529438830221946631919961684036194597899331129423209124271556491349413781117593785932096323957855730046793794526765246551266059895520550086918193311542508608460618104685509074866089624888090489894838009253941633257850621568309473902556912388065225096643874441046759871626985453222868538161694315775629640762836880760732228535091641476183956381458969463899410840960536267821064621427333394036525565649530603142680234969400335934316651459297773279665775606172582031407994198179607378245683762280037302885487251900834464581454650557929601414833921615734588139257095379769119277800826957735674444123062018757836325502728323789270710373802866393031428133241401624195671690574061419654342324638801248856147305207431992259611796250130992860241708340807605932320161268492288496255841312844061536738951487114256315111089745514203313820202931640957596464756010405845841566072044962867016515061920631004186422275908670900574606417856951911456055068251250406007519842261898059237118054444788072906395242548339221982707404473162376760846613033778706039803413197133493654622700563169937455508241780972810983291314403571877524768509857276937926433221599399876886660808368837838027643282775172273657572744784112294389733810861607423253291974813120197604178281965697475898164531258434135959862784130128185406283476649088690521047580882615823961985770122407044330583075869039319604603404973156583208672105913300903752823415539745394397715257455290510212310947321610753474825740775273986348298498340756937955646638621874569499279016572103701364433135817214311791398222983845847334440270964182851005072927748364550578634501100852987812389473928699540834346158807043959118985815145779177143619698728131459483783202081474982171858011389071228250905826817436220577475921417653715687725614904582904992461028630081535583308130101987675856234343538955409175623400844887526162643568648833519463720377293240094456246923254350400678027273837755376406726898636241037491410966718557050759098100246789880178271925953381282421954028302759408448955014676668389697996886241636313376393903373455801407636741877711055384225739499110186468219696581651485130494222369947714763069155468217682876200362777257723781365331611196811280792669481887201298643660768551639860534602297871557517947385246369446923087894265948217008051120322365496288169035739121368338393591756418733850510970271613915439590991598154654417336311656936031122249937969999226781732358023111862644575299135758175008199839236284615249881088960232244362173771618086357015468484058622329792853875623486556440536962622018963571028812361567512543338303270029097668650568557157505516727518899194129711337690149916181315171544007728650573189557450920330185304847113818315407324053319038462084036421763703911550639789000742853672196280903477974533320468368795868580237952218629120080742819551317948157624448298518461509704888027274721574688131594750409732115080498190455803416826949787141316063210686391511681774304792596709376".
